page.title: 03LIFE STYLE GIRL SATURDAY
page.content: On Saturday mornings I go to ballet. I have my lessons at 9.30 until 10.45. We do ballet and tap.We do tap for three quarters of an hour and ballet for half an hour. We have our lessons at Harborough Ambulance Hall. Afterwards when we have finished we change and find our Mum or Dad to take us home in the car. Aileen's Dad takes us home sometimes and sometimes my Dad takes us. I get home at about midday. When I get home I get changed into a jogging suit or jeans.In the afternoon I play with my friends we usually play poddy or polo. Then I go for tea and I go to bed at 8.00 clock.
